comments:
Build: 3.1 M4

Found this in my log today.  I don't know what I was doing at the time, and
didn't notice any other side-effects.

We check to make sure the tree is not disposed before calling remove. Tod, I 
thought you added some additional tracing when this type of exception 
occurred? Is this a different case?
*** Bug 101428 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Closing stale bugs - this one does not have enough information to reproduce and might have been fixed in the meantime.
